member.name: T:Hangfire.CreateBatchFailedException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when a class instance can not create a batch due to an exception.

member.name: M:Hangfire.CreateBatchFailedException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of this exception, not null.
